name: doppel
description:
doppel is a puzzle platformer where you control your character and your enemies. Enemies move in the opposite direction of your player. This game was made by thisGameDev for the Mini Jam #111: Colors!

(Note: This game was optimized for Windows & was only tested on windows. The webgl version MAY have some bugs. It is highly recommended that you play on windows if you can. If you do play the web version, its recommended you click the fullscreen button.)

Controls:

A/D - Left/Right

Spacebar - Jump

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Hope you enjoy this little prototype game jam game :)
